CustomField.description: (US Based) Does this project result in the replacement of existing production equipment, fixtures, test equipment, machinery, molds, tools, and/or dies, that are used in the production of merchandise that is sent to the United States from another country?
CustomField.inlineHelpText: (US Based) Does this project result in the replacement of existing production equipment, fixtures, test equipment, machinery, molds, tools, and/or dies, that are used in the production of merchandise that is sent to the United States from another country?
CustomField.label: Replacement of Production Equipment?
